Consumer price index from 1979 to 1998

Data for Exercise 1.34

Cpi

Format

A data frame with 20 observations on the following two variables.

year
year
cpi
consumer price index

References

Kitchens, L. J. (2003) Basic Statistics and Data Analysis. Duxbury

Examples


str(Cpi)
#> 'data.frame':	20 obs. of  2 variables:
#>  $ year: int  1979 1980 1981 1982 1983 1984 1985 1986 1987 1988 ...
#>  $ cpi : num  13.3 12.5 8.9 3.8 3.8 3.9 3.8 1.1 4.4 4.4 ...
#> 
plot(cpi ~ year, data = Cpi, type = "l", lty = 2, lwd = 2, col = "red")
barplot(Cpi$cpi, col = "pink", las = 2, main = "Problem 1.34")
